DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study application build investigator ' previous work establish prospective association stress infertility . Specifically , investigator hope collect preliminary data necessary make competitive submit R01 application NIH fund full-scale randomize controlled trial internet-based stress management program examine efficacy decrease stress increase pregnancy rate among woman try get pregnant 6-12 month without success . The program call Stress Free Now ( SFN ) develop Cleveland Clinic show effective lower stress variety population . The program introduces concepts mindfulness cognitive-behavioral therapy assist individual manage stress level . The intervention include Internet-based interaction , daily email recommended relaxation practice least four day per week . Using targeted Facebook Ads recruitment modality , investigator randomize 40 woman age 18-34 try conceive 6-12 month without success . The PI enrol woman similar study use mechanism find efficient cost-effective method identify potentially eligible individual . Women randomize SFN wait list control condition follow three month post-randomization weekly journal try conceive . The primary outcome randomize control trial stress level , measure salivary alpha-amylase , secondary outcome pregnancy rate end three-month follow-up period .
DOC.criteria: Female Aged 1834 year In stable relationship male partner Has regular internet access Trying get pregnant last used contraception 612 month ago STAIT score > =34 OR CESR10 score > =10 . Currently pregnant Participant DepoProvera injection prior 12 month Currently receive infertility treatment
